sentences.english: This tune is a representative piece of Hebei folk instrumental music.
sentences.chinese: 此曲是河北民間器樂曲中具有代表性的作品之一。

sentences.english: The author brief introduced the history of A Bing and her experience of playing the musical composition.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏作者簡介了阿炳的身世和演奏這首樂曲的體會。

sentences.english: Standing at the back of the crowd, we wrapped our arms around each other, swaying to the music.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在人羣的後面，臂挽着臂，隨着樂曲擺動着。

sentences.english: The calming music, drowns out environmental noise, especially if it's mostly instrumental.
sentences.chinese: 輕音樂會掩蓋周圍的環境噪音，特別是器樂曲。

sentences.english: Try to play music that will appeal to them.
sentences.chinese: 試着演奏對他們有吸引力的樂曲。

sentences.english: Call Tune - a modern musical «language» mixed dialects from traditional Norwegian folk music.
sentences.chinese: 音樂劇《語言》樂曲，糅合挪威民歌曲風。

sentences.english: He paused at the end of each line to pipe skirling notes on his flute.
sentences.chinese: 每唱完一句，他便停下來，用笛子演奏一段樂曲。

sentences.english: A soft strain of music wound into the air.
sentences.chinese: 柔和的樂曲在空中迴盪。

sentences.english: When the lessons are over, he plays for me his Flamenco melodies and songs of Segovia.
sentences.chinese: 課後，他爲我演奏弗拉曼柯舞曲和塞高維亞樂曲。

sentences.english: It is said that the music played by Huan was the famous Three Stanzas of Plum Blossoms.
sentences.chinese: 傳說桓伊所奏的樂曲就是著名的‘梅花三弄’。

sentences.english: Piece of instrumental music in several movements, usually in chance style.
sentences.chinese: 富舞曲節奏的多樂章器樂曲。

sentences.english: The music of this song sent her carefree and joyous.
sentences.chinese: 這支歌的樂曲使她心曠神怡。

sentences.english: Music using the Shaanxi Opera bowl cavity in the musical materials are created.
sentences.chinese: 樂曲運用了陝西關中戲曲碗碗腔的音樂素材創作而成。

sentences.english: The prelude of the night is commenced in the music of the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 晚間的序幕於夕陽的樂曲聲中揭開。

sentences.english: The book is full of interesting observations made on the nature of musical composition.
sentences.chinese: 這本書裏滿是對樂曲本質的有趣評述。

sentences.english: The movement of life has its rest in its own music.
sentences.chinese: 生命的躍動在它自己的樂曲裏得到了休息。

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
